# rtx_system_info (Data Source)

Use this data source to get system information from an RTX router.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `firmware_version` (String) The firmware version running on the RTX router.
- `id` (String) Internal identifier for this data source.
- `mac_address` (String) The MAC address of the RTX router.
- `model` (String) The RTX router model number (e.g., RTX1210, RTX830).
- `serial_number` (String) The serial number of the RTX router.
- `uptime` (String) The uptime of the RTX router.
